attributes.action: Give Police Officers, and police station ancillary staff Covid vaccine now.
attributes.additional_details: Police officers, custody suite officers, front desk civilian staff are all at danger of infection when dealing with criminality. They come into unavoidable close contact with the general public, sometimes in a restraining manner, leaving them particularly open to contracting Coronavirus. If infected, they will take this home to their families. Immediate inoculation will go towards protecting them and other members of the public they come into contact with in the course of their duties.
attributes.background: Offer all serving police officers, front and back office civilian staff, to be offered the Covid vaccination as high priority.
